name: HxFloppyBird - a game prototype for HaxeFlixel
name_original: HxFloppyBird - a game prototype for HaxeFlixel
description:
This game created strictly for educational reasons. The original game copyrights belong to their respective owners.

Repository of the game : Coming soon!

I am making 10 simple game prototypes with HaxeFlixel as a fun way to learn! This is the 9th.

The background assets are from Jesse Munguia and can be found here!
